results.title: Smoking and antihypertensive medication: interaction between blood pressure reduction and arterial stiffness.
results.text_hl: In the short term, cigarette smoking blunts the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@reduction of arterial stiffness@@@, independently of the mean BP level.

results.title: Effects of dividing amlodipine daily doses on trough drug concentrations and blood pressure control over a 24-hour period.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: The aim of the study was to investigate whether dividing a 10-mg daily dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, a long-acting calcium channel blocker, is associated with increased trough plasma @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ concentrations, reduced @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@, and improved BP control over a 24-hour period.

citations.NLM: Miyoshi K, Okura T, Nagao T, Masanori J, Irita J, Higaki J. Effects of dividing amlodipine daily doses on trough drug concentrations and blood pressure control over a 24-hour period. Clin Ther. 2013 Sep;35(9):1418-22. PMID: 23972579

results.title: Renal and vascular protective effects of cilnidipine in patients with essential hypertension.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: These results suggest that @CHEMICAL_cilnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065927 @@@cilnidipine@@@ is more effective than @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ at improving renal function and @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@.
